resources.string: "We will track your childâ€™s age to pick the right tasks."

"We recommend you strongly getting a gift as it's required for every challenge. Even a toffee or book from library can be a gift. It's not the value of the gift but the recognition it serves that's important. Please read our gifting tips in the app to know more"

We recommend using gifts even if it is small (eg, a candy or extra TV time). Using a gift acts as a reward and enables the child to wait for it and build patience. If you choose to proceed without a gift, the child will receive a virtual trophy inside the app. Trophies collected by kids can be exchanged later for gifts from parents.

"Now lock the app and give the device to your child. They will have to complete task-1 to see the gift and then wait for the 2nd task. Completing task-2 will reveal clues to find the gift. They have to find the gift using the clues. \nLet\'s make children learn, be more active, imagine and have fun with each gifting!"
"Use minimum words and play with your childs imagination. \nLet your child think and search for the gift."
